text.paragraph: Survivors may experience issues with emotional and mental health. If you have any concerns in this area, please speak with your doctors or nurses to find out how you can get help with them.
Survivors are recommended to get a minimum of 30 minutes a day of physical activity to reduce the risk of cancer recurring or developing another cancer.

act.text: Survivors may experience issues with emotional and mental health. If you have any concerns in this area, please speak with your doctors or nurses to find out how you can get help with them.
Survivors are recommended to get a minimum of 30 minutes a day of physical activity to reduce the risk of cancer recurring or developing another cancer.
